The chunk is part of the initialization process in the custom Tkinter popup menu button class. It sets the initial selected item either from a specified 'initialitem' parameter or defaults to the first item, ensuring the widget has a starting state before any user interaction.

```python
# Initialize the popup menu with an initial item if specified, otherwise set the first item as default.
```

# Determine what initial item to display and set text accordingly
        if self['initialitem']:
            self.set(self['initialitem'], fCommand = 0)
        else:
            # No initial item specified, just use first item
            self.set(0, fCommand = 0)
